author: Minecraft
description:
Discover 11 beloved Minecraft tracks remixed in energetic new ways with Minecraft's latest album: Pixel Drift! This album reimagines beloved Minecraft tracks old and new – from Kumi Tanioka's Comforting Memories to Amos Roddy's Tears – sprinkling a dash of Eurobeat energy with plenty of bitpop charm. Crafted in collaboration with Hyper Potions, Meganeko, Synthion, floopy, Turbo and EX-LYD, this album also has a retro sidescroller-inspired music video! 

Listen on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/2pxMW4xQhzJC0ALh48IWBG or most other streaming services.

Track 1 - Bromeliad - Remix: floopy. Original: Aaron Cherof   00:00
Track 2 - Comforting Memories - Remix: Synthion. Original: Kumi Tanioka   03:16
Track 3 - Broken Clocks - Remix: Hyper Potions. Original: Amos Roddy   06:58
Track 4 - A Familiar Room - Remix: Turbo. Original: Aaron Cherof   10:46
Track 5 - Labyrinthine - Remix: meganeko. Original: Lena Raine   15:03
Track 6 - Relic - Remix: EX-LYD. Original: Aaron Cherof   18:51
title: Minecraft Album - Pixel Drift
